pinot.name: Pinot-Chevauchet Champagne
pinot.text: Champagne house Pinot-Chevauchet is a small family winery, located in the heart of Champagne region, in a small village named Moussy (4 km away from Epernay).             27 Premiere-Cru vineyards covering 4 acres of ground. The local wines are strongly influenced by the specific lime-clayey teroir. The annual production of this house is 35,000 bottles. High quality standard is guaranteed by maturing all bottles for at least 5 years.

bottles.name: Cuvée Joyeuse Brut
description: harmonic mineral wine with honey tones and a dry fruit finish

bottles.name: Cuvée Généreuse Brut Nature
description: fresh, pleasant wine with a touch of white fruit
minimally 5 years maturing on yeast, then stored in cellar for one year

bottles.name: Distinguée
description: mineral, very fresh wine with a touch of ripe fruit
TOP offer (bronze medal Decanter 2017 – 89b.)

bottles.name: Distinguée
description: mineral, very fresh wine with scent of ripe fruit
Cuvée Blanc de Blancs Extra Brut Premier-Cru MAGNUM

bottles.name: Vintage 2008 Premier-Cru Blanc de Blancs
description: elegant and fresh wine from this extraordinary vintage with very fine sparkling
beautifully complements the aromas of toasts and fresh brioches

bottles.name: Cuvée Précieuse Brut Premier-Cru
description: wonderful, well-balanced champagne that truly shows the freshness and softness of Chardonnay and fruit taste of Pinot Meunier
champagne with a touch of citruses and vanilla

bottles.name: Cuvée Rêveuse Brut Rosé
description: light pink, purely bright color with soft and rich in bubbles
fresh and elegant scent combining the delicate aroma of strawberries, raspberries and citruses

collet.name: Domaine Collet Champagne
collet.text: Very young and progressive winery located in Sezanne region with three brothers (Thomas, Vincent and Florent) in charge. The main cultivated varieties are Chardonnay and Pinot Noir, which are typical for that area and based on that fact, it is easy to reveal local terroir. Typical for their wines is fermentation in wooden barrels.

bottles.name: Empreinte de Terroir Brut
description: pleasant expressive scent with tones of apples and peaches finishing with lightly almond aroma
the flavor reminiscent citruses and exotic fruits. Extraordinary and fresh summer champagne

bottles.name: Empreinte de Terroir Rosé
description: pink champagne with exceptional fruitiness, intense aroma with red fruit dominance — wild strawberries, cherries, raspberries
you can find distinctive tones of red fruits in taste and it is all wrapped up in a beautiful refined form

bottles.name: Empreinte de Terroir Chardonnay
description: fresh mineral scent with flowers and citruses
pleasant, fresh, typical Blanc de Blancs for this area

bottles.name: Empreinte de Terroir Extra Brut
description: yellow and white fruit scent
very low dosage, perfect balance of taste between acidity and fruitiness

bottles.name: Anthime Héritage
description: great complex champagne, selection of the best grapes
scent has at first caramel or butter tones like freshly baked brioches, then it smoothly goes into mineral and fruit tones
very richly structured taste with a long finish

bottles.name: Anthime Sensation
description: this highlights the importance of the Pinot Noir for this winery. Grapes come from 70 years old vineyards ,,Les Vignes“ macerated by the „Rosé de Saignée“ method
really pleasant aroma with prevailing strawberry-raspberry tones
full, fresh rosé with soft tones of wooden barrels

bottles.name: Anthime Extreme
description: unique champagne, grapes from one vineyard, microvinification in wooden barrels, low dosage
beautiful fresh champagne with tones of fresh and baked nuts
the dominant citrus and mineral flavor adorns this prestigious cuvée
